title: Googleplex - Wikipedia
snippet: The Googleplex is the corporate headquarters complex of Google and its parent company, Alphabet Inc. It is located at 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway in Mountain View, California. The original complex, with 2 million square feet (190,000 square meters) of office space, is the company's second-largest ...

title: Google Mountain View - Headquarters in Mountain View, CA United States - Apple Maps
snippet: The Googleplex is the corporate headquarters complex of Google, Inc. and its parent company Alphabet Inc., located at 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway in Mountain View, Santa Clara County, California, United States, near San Jose.

title: Googleplex - Google Headquarters Campus - Mountain View, CA
snippet: Twenty years after its completion, this iconic campus is still a pivotal model for the evolution of the modern workplace for its playful approach to work as something fun and collaborative. title: Where is Google's Headquarters? Main Office Location and Global Offices | Clay
snippet: Google's main headquarters is located at 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway in Mountain View, California, 94043. This address places the company's primary office in the center of Silicon Valley, a region recognized globally as a hub for technology and innovation.
